channel.title: How to get a jar to load another jar (HELP PLZ)

item.title: How to get a jar to load another jar (HELP PLZ)
item.dc:creator: @bigballers bigballers
item.description:
@bigballers wrote:

ok well if u got a code that WORKS can u please give it to me… in the meantime i have 1 right here… but it gives an error for me

[code]import java.io.*;
import java.net.URL;
import java.net.URLConnection;
import java.util.Properties;

public class updater
{

public updater()
{
}

public static boolean a(String s)
{
    return a(_fldfor + s, s);
}

public static boolean a(String s, String s1)
{
    BufferedOutputStream bufferedoutputstream;
    InputStream inputstream;
    bufferedoutputstream = null;
    Object obj = null;
    inputstream = null;
    URL url = new URL(s);
    bufferedoutputstream = new BufferedOutputStream(new FileOutputStream(s1));
    URLConnection urlconnection = url.openConnection();
    inputstream = urlconnection.getInputStream();
    byte abyte0[] = new byte[1024];
    int i;
    for(long l = 0L; (i = inputstream.read(abyte0)) != -1; l += i)
        bufferedoutputstream.write(abyte0, 0, i);

    try
    {
        if(inputstream != null)
            inputstream.close();
        if(bufferedoutputstream != null)
            bufferedoutputstream.close();
    }
    catch(IOException ioexception) { }
    break MISSING_BLOCK_LABEL_179;
    Exception exception;
    exception;
    boolean flag;
    exception.printStackTrace();
    flag = false;
    try
    {
        if(inputstream != null)
            inputstream.close();
        if(bufferedoutputstream != null)
            bufferedoutputstream.close();
    }
    catch(IOException ioexception1) { }
    return flag;
    Exception exception1;
    exception1;
    try
    {
        if(inputstream != null)
            inputstream.close();
        if(bufferedoutputstream != null)
            bufferedoutputstream.close();
    }
    catch(IOException ioexception2) { }
    throw exception1;
    return true;
}

public static void main(String args[])
{
    try
    {
        System.out.print(a[12]);
        URL url = new URL(_fldfor + a[7]);
        URLConnection urlconnection = url.openConnection();
        InputStream inputstream = urlconnection.getInputStream();
        Properties properties = new Properties();
        properties.load(inputstream);
        String s = properties.getProperty(a[13]);
        String s1 = properties.getProperty(a[15]);
        System.out.println(a[11]);
        byte abyte0[] = new byte[0x10000];
        File file = new File(s);
        if(file.exists())
        {
            MD5InputStream md5inputstream = new MD5InputStream(new BufferedInputStream(new FileInputStream(s)));
            int i;
            while((i = md5inputstream.read(abyte0)) != -1) ;
            _fldif = MD5._mthif(md5inputstream._mthif());
            md5inputstream.close();
        }
        if(_fldif.equals(s1))
        {
            System.out.print(a[14]);
            String s2;
            s2 = s2 = a[8] + a[10] + a[9] + a[5] + " " + _fldint + " " + _fldif;
            Process process = Runtime.getRuntime().exec(s2);
            InputStream inputstream1 = process.getInputStream();
            System.out.println(a[11]);
            inputstream1.close();
        } else
        {
            System.out.print(a[6]);
            a(_fldfor + _fldint, "./" + _fldint);
            System.out.println(a[16]);
            main(new String[0]);
        }
    }
    catch(Exception exception)
    {
        exception.printStackTrace();
        System.out.println("\nFatal error");
    }
}

public static void _mthif(String s, String s1)
{
    try
    {
        FileWriter filewriter = new FileWriter(s);
        filewriter.write(s1);
        filewriter.flush();
        filewriter.close();
    }
    catch(IOException ioexception)
    {
        System.out.println(ioexception);

}

public static String a[] = {
    "http://", "client", "dodian.com", "/", "client", "jar", "Downloading Updates...", "settings.php", "java", " -", 
    " -Xmx500M -cp .", " Success!", "Finding Dodian Server...", "JarName", "Attempting to Launch Client...", "JarHash", " Complete!"

static 
{
    _fldfor = a[0] + a[2] + a[3] + a[1] + a[3];
    _fldint = a[4] + "." + a[5];
}

}[/code]

here is the error:

updater.java:48: not a statement exception; ^ updater.java:62: not a statement exception1; ^ 2 errors

Yes i have put the // in front of the Exceptions

And this is the error i get from then on:

Im asking you guys as a smart community to PLEASE HELP! all my thanks will be givin!
